company.name: Razorpay
company.description: Razorpay provides payment solutions for Indian businesses of all sizes.

products.name: Payment Gateway
products.description: Accept online payments from customers using credit cards, debit cards, UPI, net banking, and wallets

products.name: Subscriptions
products.description: Recurring payment solutions for subscription-based businesses

products.name: Route
products.description: Route optimized payments to reduce transaction failures

products.name: Payroll
products.description: Automated payroll processing and compliance management

faq.question: What is Razorpay?
faq.answer: Razorpay is India's leading payment platform that helps businesses accept payments online. We support credit cards, debit cards, UPI, net banking, and digital wallets. We've processed over 10 million transactions and serve over 500,000 businesses.

faq.question: Who should use Razorpay?
faq.answer: Any business in India that wants to accept online payments. This includes e-commerce stores, SaaS companies, course creators, NGOs, startups, and enterprises. We serve businesses of all sizes from freelancers to large enterprises.

faq.question: Do you have a free tier?
faq.answer: Yes! You can sign up for free and start accepting payments. There's no setup fee. You only pay a commission when you receive a payment. Our standard payment gateway charges 2% + GST for credit/debit cards and 1% + GST for UPI and net banking.

faq.question: What payment methods do you support?
faq.answer: We support all major payment methods: Credit Cards, Debit Cards, UPI, Net Banking, Digital Wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay), and Buy Now Pay Later options.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: We offer flexible pricing: Credit & Debit Cards: 2% + GST. UPI & Net Banking: 1% + GST. BNPL & Wallets: 2% + GST. There's no monthly fee or setup cost. You only pay when you receive a payment.

faq.question: How long does it take to set up?
faq.answer: You can sign up and get started in minutes. For standard merchant accounts, it takes 1-2 hours. For high-risk categories, it might take 24-48 hours for verification.

faq.question: What is the settlement time?
faq.answer: Settlements happen daily. Your payments are typically settled to your bank account within 24-48 hours. Instant settlements are available for premium plans.

faq.question: Do you provide APIs and documentation?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive REST APIs and detailed documentation. We support multiple programming languages including PHP, Python, Node.js, Java, Ruby, and .NET. Our sandbox environment lets you test before going live.

faq.question: What security measures do you have?
faq.answer: We are PCI DSS Level 1 certified, the highest security standard in the payments industry. We use 256-bit SSL encryption, fraud detection systems, and tokenization to protect customer data.

faq.question: Do you support subscriptions?
faq.answer: Yes! Razorpay Subscriptions allows you to set up recurring billing. Perfect for SaaS, membership sites, and subscription boxes. You can manage billing cycles, pause/resume subscriptions, and handle failed payments automatically.

faq.question: What support do you provide?
faq.answer: We offer 24/7 email and phone support. Premium plans get dedicated account managers. We also have extensive documentation, API references, and a developer community.

faq.question: Can you handle international payments?
faq.answer: We primarily focus on the Indian market. However, we can accept international cards. For international expansion, contact our team for enterprise solutions.
